subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers handed out more than $500,000 in free goodies to thank their fans, then flirted with giving away a crucial game. LeBron James scored 24 points and capped a decisive run to open the fourth quarter with one of his powerhouse dunks as Cleveland defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks, 109-96, in its regular-season finale last night.
